detail.installNote: This agent will be added to your account. A matching model from your organization will be assigned automatically. You can customize the agent's settings after installation.

missingIdentifier.title: Missing Agent Identifier
missingIdentifier.description: No agent identifier was provided. Please use a valid install link from the marketplace.

notFound.title: Agent Not Found
notFound.description: The requested agent could not be found in the marketplace. It may have been removed or unpublished.

fetchFailed.title: Unable to Load Agent
fetchFailed.description: Could not load agent details from the marketplace. Please try again later.

error.unavailable: The marketplace is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
error.noModel: No compatible model is available in your organization. Please contact your administrator.
error.generic: Something went wrong while installing the agent. Please try again.
